p: The water absorption capacity (WAC) of yogurt protein was determined using the protocol described by Rodríguez‐Ambriz, Martínez‐Ayala, Millán and Davila‐Ortiz ( 2005). The WAC (%) of the sample is calculated using by dividing the weight of the water absorbed by the weight of the protein sample (Al‐Shamsi et al., 2018).
